paper_abstract: An example of anomalous behaviour of the (Normalised) Probabilistic Rand Index - due to its non-monotonicity with the fraction of misclassified pixels - raises doubts on its suitability as a metric for cutaneous lesion segmentation. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Is (N)PRI suitable for evaluating automated segmentation of cutaneous lesions?
